title: Possibility of Month-scale Quasi-periodic Oscillations in the Gamma-ray Light Curve of OP 313
summary: In this work, we report evidence suggesting the potential future detection of a month-scale quasi-periodic oscillation (QPO) in the gamma-ray light curve of OP 313. We analysed almost 16.8 years of Fermi-LAT gamma-ray data and applied the Bayesian block method to the monthly-binned light curve.
